Package bt.processor.torrent

Class TorrentContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.processor.torrent.TorrentContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessingContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MagnetContext

    public class TorrentContext
extends Object
implements ProcessingContext
    Accumulates data, that is specific to standard torrent download/upload.
    Since:
    1.3
